name: Your Moonlight 🌙
message: Happy Birthday! You are a ray of sunshine and deserve the world!

name: The One Who Holds Your Heart 💌
message: 🎂 I got you a virtual cake. But I ate it. Oops. Still... Happy Birthday! 😋

name: Your Secret Smile Keeper 😊
message: You're such a kind soul. Wishing you a year filled with love and laughter!

name: The One Who Adores You
message: I’ve never met someone as thoughtful and sweet as you. Happy Birthday, queen 👑

name: Someone Who Cares
message: Keep smiling, keep shining – the world needs your light. HBD!

name: Forever Yours 💖
message: You're more than a friend; you’re family. Happy Birthday, and lots of hugs!

name: Your Biggest Fan
message: You deserve nothing but love and happiness today and always. 💗
